The room is located inside a spacious 2 bedroom + den apartment, around 1,200 square foot apartment. The apartment is fully furnished including kitchen, bathrooms, living area, dining area and bedrooms. TV, DVD player and cable TV and sound system in living room.   The apartment is located in the same building of Metro, Yonge & Bloor subway station, and has direct indoor access to a few shopping malls, the Bay, Holt Renfrew, CIBC, Manulife Center, direct access to many food courts, major banks and fitness gym ( extreme fitnes and good life ), shoppers drugmart, post offices, LCBO, Rabba... all access from within the building to make this location one of the most convenient addresses in downtown Toronto.
